evidence.text: Regex search across all 8 documents found no instances of 'monitor' in the context of compliance reports or court-ordered monitoring. All matches related to protest monitoring (e.g., 'monitoring the protests') not compliance reporting. No court-appointed monitor exists to issue such reports.

Regex search across all 8 documents found 3 total matches for 'monitor', all related to protest monitoring (e.g., 'Governor’s Office of Emergency Services, which was monitoring the protests') rather than court-appointed monitors. No references to court-appointed or agreed-upon monitors found in any document.
